home.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer
home.intro: A full-stack engineer with 7 years of experience, specializing in scalable system design and cloud infrastructure with AWS and Python. Proficient across the entire technology stack from backend to frontend, I am passionate about building software that delivers real business value.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I am dev-roar-researcher, a researcher affiliated with dev-roar-lab. I have been working as a full-stack engineer for approximately 7 years. I specialize in cloud infrastructure and backend development, focusing on designing and building scalable and reliable systems.

career.title: Career Summary
career.education: Studied Information Engineering for 5 years at a National Institute of Technology and started my career as a software engineer

firstPosition.role: Worked on contract development of PLM packages for manufacturing industry
firstPosition.details: Developed web applications using C# and JavaScript, built infrastructure and CI/CD environments using AWS (Terraform, CodePipeline), and supported customers' in-house development initiatives

currentPosition.role: System Manager at a financial IT company
currentPosition.details: Assigned to the development department for Proprietary Trading System (PTS) and security token market systems. Developed external-facing web systems and back-office operation systems using Python, TypeScript, and Next.js. Led quality assurance initiatives through DevContainer setup, test infrastructure (pytest), and CI/CD implementation

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise.items: My strength lies in covering the entire technology stack, from network-level infrastructure to application development, Platform Engineering for developer experience enhancement, and project task management. I excel at designing, implementing, and operating systems end-to-end, translating business requirements into technical solutions.
